title.narrative: PROGRAMME PLANNING AND MONITORING

description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes, which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Evaluation, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Research, Supply And Logistics. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country Programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF HEALTH AND SOCIAL PROTECTION OF THE POPULATION

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes

description.narrative: CO and partners received support, guidance and tools to effectively plan and monitor programmes. PME team supported the CO and Deputy Representative in roll-out of a new county programme 2023-2026 development process. UNICEF continued to render technical assistance to MoHSPP’s monitoring efforts in delivery and distribution of COVID-19-related supplies and vaccination in Tajikistan. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/01/2022
